title: Machel gets scandalous in ‘Bazodee’ * – Trinidad & Tobago Express
content:
Machel gets scandalous in 'Bazodee' * 
Trinidad & Tobago Express 
Reigning International Power Soca Monarch Machel Montano has for over 30 years captivated audiences the world over with his infectious music and electrifying live performances. He now makes the leap onto the silver screen with his motion-picture debut ...
